about_the_game:
Software introduction:

NB Desktop is a desktop dynamic desktop software.



This DLC function:

With the function of live broadcasting management, the status of live broadcasting room can be displayed simply by inputting the link of live broadcasting room, and multi-live broadcasting can be seen at a glance.

Now support: bilibilibili, betta. Other live studio support
detailed_description:
Software introduction:

NB Desktop is a desktop dynamic desktop software.



This DLC function:

With the function of live broadcasting management, the status of live broadcasting room can be displayed simply by inputting the link of live broadcasting room, and multi-live broadcasting can be seen at a glance.

Now support: bilibilibili, betta. Other live studio support
name: NB Desktop - Stream 直播

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: With the function of live broadcasting management, the status of live broadcasting room can be displayed simply by inputting the link of live broadcasting room, and multi-live broadcasting can be seen at a glance. Now support: bilibilibili, betta. Other live studio support
